GSD.description:
btrfs: qgroup: fix sleep from invalid context bug in btrfs_qgroup_inherit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.226 by commit 8eb912af525042a7365295eb62f6d5270c2a6462. For more details please see the references link.
